text: @JoeBiden If you still support the dumbass in the WH on his response to #COVID19 then we have problems. Open your eyes & realize it’s time for a change in Washington! Some1 who isn’t delusional & will actually listen to the science & actually save American lives! @JoeBiden is that person!
